author: Cleo Abram
description:
Scientists figured out that penguin poop does something very important in Antarctica!

It’s an incredible fertilizer, but now it’s being studied because it’s the source of two important gases that work to create larger and larger particles in the air…

Eventually becoming aerosols…and then CLOUDS that then cool the continent.

DOI: 10.1038/s43247-025-02312-2

#shorts #penguin #antarctica #poop #clouds #guano
title: Penguin Poop Is Weirdly Important
